user.title: OpenData South Tyrol
user.description:
This integration uses data provided by [Open Data South Tyrol](https://data.civis.bz.it/dataset) under the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal - Public Domain Dedication (CC0 1.0) license. Not all available data types are supported by this integration.

Supported data types: {supported_types}

Integration version: {version}.

Configuration data is retrieved in real-time from the provided API and loading may take a few seconds.

language.title: Language Selection
language.description:
Welcome to the OpenData South Tyrol integration!

This integration allows you to access public data from the Autonomous Province of Bolzano through the Open Data Hub.

Supported data types are: {supported_types}.

Select the data language and proceed with the configuration.

Version: {version}

Configuration data is retrieved in real-time from the provided API and loading may take a few seconds.

group.title: Select Group
group.description: The data are organized into thematic groups. Select the data group you wish to monitor. This choice will determine which datasets will be available in the next step.

package.title: Select Dataset
package.description:
Choose the specific dataset to monitor within the selected group. Each dataset contains data related to a specific theme.

Current API URL: {api_url}

resource.title: Select Resource
resource.description:
Select the JSON resource you want to monitor. The resources are the actual data sources within the selected dataset.

Current API URL: {api_url}

rows.title: Select Items
rows.description:
Select the specific items you wish to monitor. You can select multiple items simultaneously using the checkboxes.

Current API URL: {api_url}

fields.title: Select Fields
fields.description:
For the selected items, choose which specific fields you want to monitor. These fields will become sensors in Home Assistant.

Current API URL: {api_url}

confirm.title: Confirm Configuration

error.no_packages: No dataset available in the selected group
